StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetContactSummary]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@OrgID int, @RecruiterID uniqueidentifier, @FiscalYear int, @Month int
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @CalendarYear int
IF @Month = 10 OR @Month = 11 OR @Month = 12 BEGIN SET @CalendarYear = @FiscalYear - 1 END ELSE BEGIN SET @CalendarYear = @FiscalYear END
DECLARE @SchoolYear int
IF @Month = 7 OR @Month = 8 OR @Month = 9 OR @Month = 10 OR @Month = 11 OR @Month = 12 BEGIN SET @SchoolYear = @CalendarYear + 1 END ELSE BEGIN SET @SchoolYear = @CalendarYear END
CREATE TABLE #ContactSummary ( Name varchar(100), NumberOnList int, NumberLe. int )
DECLARE @CurrentYear int DECLARE @CurrentMonth int SET @CurrentYear = YEAR(GETDATE()) SET @CurrentMonth = MONTH(GETDATE())
DECLARE @CurrentSchoolYear int
IF @CurrentMonth = 7 OR @CurrentMonth = 8 OR @CurrentMonth = 9 OR @CurrentMonth = 10 OR @CurrentMonth = 11 OR @CurrentMonth = 12 BEGIN SET @CurrentSchoolYear = @CurrentYear + 1 END ELSE BEGIN SET @CurrentSchoolYear = @CurrentYear END
DECLARE @SchoolName varchar(100) DECLARE @SchoolID uniqueidentifier DECLARE @Area varchar(3) DECLARE @RecordCount int
SELECT * INTO #HighSchool FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL hs WHERE hs.ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND hs.School_Type = 'HS' AND hs.DELETED <> 'Y'
DECLARE @Recrui.ngPersonID int
SELECT @Recrui.ngPersonID = RECRUITING_PERSON_ID FROM MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_PERSON WHERE rowguid = @RecruiterID
SELECT hs.HighSchool_Name AS SchoolName ,hs.RowGuid AS SchoolID ,ms.SectorDesignator + ISNULL(CAST(hsp.Designator AS VARCHAR(2)), '') AS Area INTO #SectorHighSchool FROM #HighSchool hs INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE hsp ON hsp.SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.MapsSectorZip msz ON LEFT(hs.ZIP_CODE, 5) = msz.Zip LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.MapsSector ms ON ms.SectorID = msz.SectorID WHERE hsp.RECRUITER_ID = @Recrui.ngPersonID AND hsp.SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear AND SectorType = 'E' ORDER BY ms.SectorDesignator, hsp.Designator, hs.HighSchool_Name
SELECT @RecordCount = Count(*) FROM #SectorHighSchool
WHILE @RecordCount <> 0 BEGIN
SELECT Top 1 @SchoolName = SchoolName, @SchoolID = SchoolID, @Area = Area FROM #SectorHighSchool
DECLARE @LoopCount int SET @LoopCount = 0
DECLARE @Gradua.onYear int
WHILE @LoopCount < 3 BEGIN
SET @Gradua.onYear = @CurrentSchoolYear - @LoopCount
INSERT INTO #ContactSummary SELECT CAST(@Gradua.onYear AS char(4)) +' ' + @SchoolName + ' ' + @Area , ( SELECT Count(DISTINCT p.ProspectId) FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.ImportEvent ie INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.ProspectSchool ps ON ps.schoolid = ie.schoolid INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect p ON p.prospec.d= ps.prospec.d AND p.Gradua.onYear = ie.Gradua.onYear WHERE ie.SchoolId = @SchoolID AND ie.gradua.onyear = @Gradua.onYear AND ie.ImportEventStatusTypeId = 3 ) , ( SELECT Count(DISTINCT p.ProspectId) FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.ImportEvent ie INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.ProspectSchool ps ON ps.schoolid = ie.schoolid INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect p ON p.prospec.d= ps.prospec.d AND p.Gradua.onYear = ie.Gradua.onYear WHERE ie.SchoolId = @SchoolID AND ie.gradua.onyear = @Gradua.onYear AND ProspectDisposi.onId = 1 AND ie.ImportEventStatusTypeId = 3 )
SET @LoopCount = @LoopCount + 1 END
SET @LoopCount = 0
DELETE FROM #SectorHighSchool WHERE SchoolID = @SchoolID
SELECT @RecordCount = Count(*) FROM #SectorHighSchool END
SELECT * FROM #ContactSummary
DROP Table #ContactSummary DROP Table #SectorHighSchool DROP TABLE #HighSchool
END
